content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully built on the map in this update. The agent made multiple attempts to establish a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but none succeeded because the Lab item was never available in the inventory and required ingredients could not be produced. Although existing furnaces were used for smelting (an iron furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0) and a copper furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0) for processing ores), these were pre‐existing facilities rather than new structures created by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
– Incorrect API Usage for Entity Retrieval:
  • Use the proper function signature for get_entities. Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or extraneous positional arguments.
  • Check the return value of get_entities before iterating; if it can be None, substitute an empty list to avoid TypeErrors.
  
– Lab Placement and Crafting Failures:
  • Verify that a Lab item exists in the inventory before attempting to place it.
  • Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available in sufficient quantities prior to crafting a Lab.
  • Cross-check resource requirements and update inventory counts to prevent recurring crafting failures.
